path: artifacts/Stealth SHIBA Full Smart Contract Security Audit.pdf

project_path.StealthSHIBA: contracts/Stealth SHIBA Full Smart Contract Security Audit/StealthSHIBA

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: Functions `includeInReward()` and `_getCurrentSupply` may cause OUT_OF_GAS exception if there are long excluded addresses lists.

findings.title: Owner privileges
findings.description: Owner has excessive privileges to change fees, maximum transaction amount, exclusion from fee, lock, and unlock.
